module.name: googleSpeechProcess
module.description: This module is responsible for analysing the speech transcript and send out the correct meaning of the phrase
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This module retrieves the transcript output from speech transcript and queries google cloud language services and provides the output on a port.

param.desc: Module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name.
Use 16000 hertz for the sample rate

input.description: Port to receive speech transcript to analyse

output.description: Sends the phrase analysis result of the output of google language query
